item.title: about
item.description: My name is Gyuri. This is my blog where I write about technology, among other things. I worked in several startups, some of which have been acquired or IPO’ed. I created and maintain a photo app, which you can checkout if you have an iPhone. I studied Computer Science at KAIST. You can contact me at gyuri at deepfilter.com About the blog The site is built with Hugoâ€”a static site generator made with Go.
